alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 03 at 3:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Thunderstorms producing a strong gust front will impact portions of southeastern Pierce, Brantley, central Ware, southeastern Clinch and northern Charlton Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 335 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Patterson to 8 miles east of Manor to 8 miles east of Mayday. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Fargo, Stephen Foster State Park, Hickox, Braganza, Raybon, Waynesville, Race Pond, Fort Mudge and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Clinch; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
